bibl.title: Francis Stephen Medcraf vs. Robert T. Hodge. Criminal.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Western District Court of Wasington, Northern Division

div1.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON. NORTHERN DIVISION.
In the matter of the petition of Francis Stephen Medcraf for a Writ of Habeas Corpus. ) No. 3038 ORDER

The petitioner in the above entitled matter having deposited in the Registry of this Court the sum of $500.00, cash bail for his appearance, and the said petitioner having this dday executed and filed a bond in the sum of $500.00, conditioned according to law, to take the place and in lieu of the $500.00 heretofore deposited;
IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED That a check be drawn upon the Registry of this Court in favor of Francis Stephen Medcraf in the sum of $495.00, and to the Clerk's fees and costs amount $5.00, total $500.00.
